channel.title: Portforwarded but still cant connect!
channel.description:
I portforward my server exactly as it shows here: http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/Netgear/WNR1000v2/Runescape_Private_Server.htm
but still my friend cant get online! I placed the no-ip into the client and ran my source but it still wont run where my friend is..... HELP?? its 317

item.title: Portforwarded but still cant connect!
item.dc:creator: @intdubpk intdubpk
item.description:
@intdubpk wrote:

go to this site : http://www.canyouseeme.org/

type your port in and check if its open

Read full topic
